sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">23090f1347f1c210d21ff884116d436e</macroponent><name>list_2/query</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  let date = api.state.dateFilter;

  if (date) {
	  return 'opened_atON' + date + '@javascript:gs.dateGenerate("' + date + '","start")@javascript:gs.dateGenerate("'+ date + '","end")';
  }

  return '';
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-02 01:33:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>752c3f1347f5c210d21ff884116d438c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>list_2/query</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_752c3f1347f5c210d21ff884116d438c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-02 01:33:08</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">23090f1347f1c210d21ff884116d436e</macroponent><name>list_3/query</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  let date = api.state.dateFilter;

  if (date) {
	  return 'opened_atON' + date + '@javascript:gs.dateGenerate("' + date + '","start")@javascript:gs.dateGenerate("'+ date + '","end")';
  }

  return '';
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-02 01:02:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>352c3f1347f5c210d21ff884116d438c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>list_3/query</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_352c3f1347f5c210d21ff884116d438c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-02 01:32:50</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
